General.Name: Beijing Trust Far Tech
General.Description: Beijing Trust&Far Technology CO.,LTD provides data center information technology (IT) operation and maintenance services. The company offers maintenance service, system integration, human outsourcing, on-site project management, database container, integrated operation and maintenance, open source business services, cloud operation, monitoring and operation and management, and open source software. Beijing Trust&Far Technology CO.,LTD was founded in 2004 and is based in Beijing, China.

2.Name: Ms. Jingying  Lin
2.Title: Director, Deputy GM & Sec. to the Board
